skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic repository containing only static documentation. No executable code, scripts, network operations, or filesystem access beyond reading the skill files. No security risks identified.

content.value_statement: Your assets may not follow Anthropic brand standards. This skill provides official colors and typography guidance for consistent styling across all your materials.
actual_capabilities: Lists official main and accent color hex values for consistent branding
Specifies Poppins font for headings with Arial fallback
Specifies Lora font for body text with Georgia fallback
Recommends smart color selection based on background contrast
Recommends accent color cycling for non-text shapes
limitations: Does not install fonts or check font availability
Does not generate layouts or new visual assets
Provides guidance only and does not apply changes automatically
Requires tools that support font and color edits

use_cases.title: Brand aligned slides
use_cases.description: Apply official colors and typography to presentation decks for consistent visuals.

use_cases.title: Consistent documents
use_cases.description: Align briefs and proposals with Anthropic brand styling guidelines.

use_cases.title: Polished demo assets
use_cases.description: Style demo materials to match Anthropic brand expectations.

prompt_templates.title: Quick brand pass
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and typography to this document. Use readable text colors and keep headings distinct.

prompt_templates.title: Slide styling
prompt_templates.prompt: Style this slide deck with Anthropic colors. Set Poppins for headings, Lora for body text, and rotate accent colors on shapes.

prompt_templates.title: Brand alignment
prompt_templates.prompt: Review current styling and align it with Anthropic brand guidelines. Update fonts and colors with proper fallbacks.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced pass
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand styling to each section. Use main colors for backgrounds, accent colors for shapes, and ensure contrast for all text.

output_examples.input: Apply Anthropic brand styling to my slide deck.
output: Headings use Poppins with Arial fallback
Body text uses Lora with Georgia fallback
Primary text uses Dark and Light palette colors
Accent shapes cycle Orange, Blue, and Green
Backgrounds use Light and Light Gray tones

best_practices: Install Poppins and Lora fonts before applying styles
Maintain strong contrast between text and background
Use accent colors for shapes and highlights only
anti_patterns: Mixing non-brand fonts with the recommended typography
Using accent colors for long body text
Ignoring contrast rules for text and backgrounds

faq.question: Is it compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the guidance works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides colors and typography guidance only, not layout redesign.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing templates?
faq.answer: Yes, apply the guidance to your current templates and assets.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: The content is static and does not transmit or store your data.

faq.question: What should I do if fonts are missing?
faq.answer: Use the provided fallbacks: Arial for headings and Georgia for body.

faq.question: How does it compare to general styling tools?
faq.answer: It targets Anthropic brand standards instead of generic themes.
